channel.title: [PI] NPC HP Won't change | Most NPC's have 1200 HP
channel.description:
I've tried everything I could think of to fix the issue NPCHandler.java / NPC.cfg
My NPC.cfg looks like npc = 105 Callisto 66 900 ID NAME LVL HP
This has never happened to me before and I really need to fix this I'm trying to make a custom boss
